alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Isle of Wight , the northeastern City of Suffolk, the City of Hampton and the southern City of Newport News through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crittenden, or near Smithfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crittenden and Driver around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Carrollton, Longview, Benns Church, Huntersville, Wills Corner, Bethel Church, Hilton Village, Chuckatuck, Lawson and Hobson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Suffolk
